Package com.hamweather.aeris.tiles

Interface Summary
AerisOverlay Interface defining the Aeris Overlays
LoadTileAnimationTask.LoadTileCallback Interface for handling the callback of the tile loading.
LoadTileAnimationTask.LoadTileProgressBar Interface to pass to the LoadTileAnimationTask.withProgress(LoadTileProgressBar).
 

Class Summary
AerisAnimationInfo Animation info returned from animation load task
AerisConstants Holds references to server constants variables
AerisPointHelper Helper class for loading aeris overlays.
AerisTileProvider Handles adding tiles layers using the Aeris API to grab tiles with the associated mapview.
BuildAnimationOverlayUrl  
BuildTileTimeURL Creates Time Url for a specific type code
BuildTileURL Builds a url to grab a tile from a specific time, code and section of a weather map.
LoadTileAnimationTask Task to load the animation tiles for the current maps Latitude and longitude bounds.
RadarAnimationTileProvider  
TileTimeInfo JSON wrapper for a file object received from Tile timestamp request
TimeCodeResponse JSON wrapper for the time code response
 

Enum Summary
AerisPointData Aeris point enum that helps setup each loading with the proper aeris query, proper handler and proper legend.
AerisPolygonData Aeris polygon enum that helps setup each loading with the proper aeris query, proper handler and proper legend.
AerisTile Constants for different types of tile map overlays
Day Day constant for the day codes.
